_comment: Template for layout-manifest.json - Design Director Gem outputs this based on video analysis

meta.referenceVideo: description or filename of reference video

design_dna.font_recommendations: Use a display font for headers, clean sans-serif for body.
design_dna.color_story: Dark backgrounds with neon accents for tech feel.
design_dna.motion_philosophy: Subtle parallax, smooth transitions, no jarring animations.

sections.description: Full-viewport hero with layered background and centered content

layers.classes: relative z-10 flex flex-col items-center justify-center h-full text-center px-4

content.h1_classes: text-6xl md:text-8xl font-display font-bold tracking-tight text-white drop-shadow-xl
content.cta_classes: mt-8 px-8 py-4 bg-brand-primary text-white rounded-full font-semibold hover:bg-brand-primary/90 transition-all
content.cta_secondary_classes: mt-4 px-8 py-4 border border-white/30 text-white rounded-full font-semibold hover:bg-white/10 transition-all

sections.description: Feature cards in a responsive grid

card.wrapper_classes: bg-brand-dark/50 rounded-2xl p-8 border border-white/10 hover:border-brand-primary/50 transition-all

content.h2_classes: text-4xl md:text-5xl font-display font-bold text-white mb-4
content.cta_classes: px-8 py-4 bg-white text-brand-primary rounded-full font-semibold hover:bg-white/90 transition-all

asset_prompts.description: Abstract dark gradient background with subtle geometric shapes and light particles. Tech/modern feel. 1920x1080 minimum.
asset_prompts.style: digital art, dark mode, subtle glow effects

asset_prompts.description: Subtle grain/noise texture for overlay. Transparent PNG, tileable.

for_builder: Scan all layers for asset references and verify they exist
Follow z-index layering exactly as specified
Use the exact classes provided - do not improvise
If an asset is missing, create a red placeholder div
for_content_agent: Body content fills in after layout is built
